comment.body: Linux works out-of-the-box if you know how to run a script from terminal. Making it work with Tor Browser requires some work, but it's well explained in documentation, and Tor Browser itself also works out-of-the-box if downloaded from official website or from the "torbrowser-launcher" package for distros that have it.
How do I update? I have version 0.6.5 and the builtin updater in the menu, after reconnecting I still have old version... ;/
